          <title>
            <string language="en">Current flow in an electric motor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktueller Fluß in einen Elektromotor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoulement actuel dans un moteur électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fluxo atual em um motor elétrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Flusso corrente in un motore elettrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρούσα ροή σε μια ηλεκτρική μηχανή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flujo actual en un motor eléctrico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how a commutator reverses the direction of current through he wire loop as it turns.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric motors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic coils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">permanent magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein Kommutator die 
Richtung des Stromes durch er Leitungsschlaufe aufhebt, während er 
sich dreht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment un collecteur 
renverse la direction du courant à travers il boucle pendant qu'il 
tourne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como um comutador 
inverte o sentido da corrente completamente ele aro de arame enquanto 
gira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come un commutatore 
inverte il senso della corrente attraverso lui ciclo di legare mentre 
gira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς ένας μεταγωγός 
αντιστρέφει την κατεύθυνση του ρεύματος μέσω του βρόχος καλωδίων
καθώς γυρίζει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo un conmutador 
invierte la dirección de la corriente a través él anillo mientras 
que da vuelta.</string>
          </description>
